ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hardware
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a 1.4Ghz AMD Athlon, 1Gb DDR RAM, GeForce 4 Ti 4600 128mb vid card, Philips Acoustic Edge 5.1 sound card, Altec Lansing 4.1 speakers, 17 inch KDS flat
ygData.messageBody:
I have a 1.4Ghz AMD Athlon, 1Gb DDR RAM, GeForce 4 Ti 4600 128mb vid card,
Philips Acoustic Edge 5.1 sound card, Altec Lansing 4.1 speakers, 17 inch
KDS flat tube monitor, HP digital mouse, Micro Innovations ergonomic
keyboard, Zoom v92 kflex 56k modem (for backup dialup when satellite
transmitter stops working) and some kind of satellite modem via USB port.
Oh, and I have a cool psuedo leather chair that glides back and forth,
swivels, and reclines. It has pockets on the sides to store stuff in. For
those loooong camps I lean back, put my feet up on the foot rest and relax.
My desk is shit though.
luv,
-Su
>
>So this is just a question to find out what kind of hardware you use to run
EverQuest. I suppose a Ps/2 counts as well since >you can technically run a
version of EQ on it, but I was more curious as to everyone's computers.
